lead_paragraph: Belgian premier league club Standard Liege will seek to bar their supporters from travelling to away matches after their match with Charleroi was abandoned on Sunday due to crowd trouble.

headline.print_headline: Belgium's Standard Bars Travelling Fans After Crowd Trouble
headline.main: Belgium's Standard Bars Travelling Fans After Crowd Trouble

snippet: Belgian premier league club Standard Liege will seek to bar their supporters from travelling to away matches after their match with Charleroi was abandoned on Sunday due to crowd trouble....
